actions.name: add_faq_item
actions.description: Adds a new question/answer item to an existing FAQ; supports categories.

actions.name: add_video
actions.description: Adds a YouTube video URL as knowledge to the Aidbase knowledge base.

actions.name: add_website
actions.description: Adds a website URL as a knowledge source for Aidbase.

actions.name: create_chatbot_reply
actions.description: Generates an AI chatbot reply given a message and optional session context.

actions.name: create_faq
actions.description: Creates a new FAQ entry with title and description.

actions.name: start_training
actions.description: Starts a training job on an existing knowledge base item (FAQ, website, video, etc.).

triggers.name: email_priority_changed
triggers.description: Fires when an email’s priority is changed.

triggers.name: email_received
triggers.description: Fires when a new email is received in an Aidbase inbox.

triggers.name: email_sent
triggers.description: Fires when an email is sent from Aidbase.

triggers.name: email_status_changed
triggers.description: Fires when the status of an email changes.

triggers.name: ticket_created
triggers.description: Fires when a new ticket is created in Aidbase.

triggers.name: ticket_new_comment
triggers.description: Fires when a new comment is added to an existing ticket.

triggers.name: ticket_priority_changed
triggers.description: Fires when the priority of an existing ticket changes.

triggers.name: ticket_status_changed
triggers.description: Fires when a ticket’s overall status changes.
